comment.author: 24141292@N02
comment._content:
Fascinating to see these early photos of Reims, prior to the grevious damage it suffered in World War I. The two left hand figures here were mutilated beyond recognition, but they may be restored in the current restoration.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/amthomson/4272225650/in/set-72157623163117787/]
